author: spearmankahron@gmail.com (Kahron Spearman)
title: Justin Timberlake Opens Oscars With Mesmerizing Performance‚Äîand Jackie Chan Loves It
text:
Screengrab via Live Satellite News/Youtube BTW 
Justin Timberlake opened the 2017 Academy Awards with a mesmerizing performance of his hit ‚Äú Can‚Äôt Stop the Feeling .‚Äù 
The most intriguing portion of the performance was the singer‚Äôs dance routine‚Äîhe made sure the stiff crowd loosened up and chained to the beat. Timberlake even made his way over to wife and actor Jessica Biel. But seriously, how cute are Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel? üòç #Oscars https://t.co/p4MmpfwHuI pic.twitter.com/RwlVkyAZZV ‚Äî Us Weekly (@usweekly) February 27, 2017 
Jackie Chan, Sting, and many others were miraculously on beat throughout. Jackie Chan is all of us dancing to @jtimberlake 's "Can't Stop the Feeling." #Oscars pic.twitter.com/NZwNNfnKGd ‚Äî Good Morning America (@GMA) February 27, 2017 
The performance‚Äôs turn into Bill Withers‚Äô ‚Äú Lovely Day ‚Äù tied the new with a classic tune, to which Timberlake pointed at Denzel Washington, nominated for best actor for his role in Fences , and told him, ‚ÄúI know you know this one.‚Äù ‚Äî Justin Timberlake (@jtimberlake) February 26, 2017 
Ryan Gosling and Dev Patel, however, didn't know the words to "Lovely Day," and danced awkwardly.
